> But thats getting away from the topic, I don't have any comments on
> characters except that there are a lot of balance issues that I'm 
sure
> you'll all have fun arguing over :)

That is what I am hoping will happen: lots of arguments back and forth 
to generate lots of messages.

Don't worry because I do have plans for dealing with game issues like 
the teleportation problem.

I am sure that when we do get to hybrids/dual class, discussion will 
be kicked up another notch because I do have some brand-new ideas to 
share for that discussion.  BTW, hybrids/dual class discussion will be 
L-A-S-T thing discussed with characters.

I plan on adopting a pace of covering 1-3 characters a week.  What I 
plan on doing is hammering out a text document for improvements in the 
characters as we go along.
